properties.description: Curious about road conditions? This webcam can help you determine if the park's roads are icy.
properties.name: Annie Spring Entrance Station

properties.description: Is Crater Lake visible today? Sometimes the lake is hidden by clouds, especially in the winter. This view looks north across the lake from the Sinnott Overlook at Rim Village (elevation 7,100 feet).
properties.name: Crater Lake

properties.description: This view is useful in showing the amount of snow currently on the ground in the park. It can be 10 to 15 feet deep in the late winter and early spring.
properties.name: Steel Information Center
